name: Deadlines (DarlingAvocado)
description:
College classes in the quarter system are not for the faint of heart. Assignments start off slow and build up quickly, threatening to overwhelm you. You now have a 10-page paper due and life is full of friends, phones, and Netflix playlists. With enough coffee and precious sleep, you just might make it through to finals.

Use < and > keys to move your player and catch the papers. Make sure to avoid the distractions of the tv, phone, and friends. Keep your energy up with sleep and coffee. Now go and submit that essay!
